title: Oil Steady After Biggest Drop in Three Weeks With Glut in Focus
description: Oil steadied after the biggest drop in almost three weeks, as traders look to reports later this week for confirmation of a glut.
content: Oil steadied after the biggest drop in almost three weeks, as traders look to reports later this week for confirmation of a glut.
